subject: IntelliJ IDEA JUnit Test Runner
msgSnippet: Someone wrote here (don t know which thread) that there is something really great with the IDEA test runner. So I installed that IDE to see what is so great.
messageBody:
Someone wrote here (don't know which thread) that there is something
really great with the IDEA test runner.

So I installed that IDE to see what is so great. What appeared after
starting a test is just the simple Swing test runner of JUnit.

Is there a super duper JUnit Test Runner I missed in that IDE?
